name: 卓建宏
objective:
This course aims to familiarize students with common English expressions in various business scenarios, enhance their listening and speaking abilities through structured exercises, and enable them to effectively employ conversation strategies in business settings.
本課程旨在讓學生熟悉各式商務場景中的常見英語用法，通過結構化練習提高聽說能力，能夠在商務場合中有效地運用會話策略。
